author: axic3354
content:
>  the same with INVALID opcode

The invalid opcode was supposed to be retroactively applied, because it was an opcode which was never allocated and we agreed *not to allocate it* for any other purposes, e.g. it applies from genesis.

author: axic3354
content: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1803 proposes to rename it to ABORT though, to more clearly articulate its meaning. The current "the INVALID opcode, not that other invalid opcode" is a bit messy ðŸ™‚
